title: Indigo co-founder Rakesh Gangwal donates Rs 100 crore to IIT Kanpur - Moneycontrol
content: Indigo co-founder Rakesh Gangwal donates Rs 100 crore to IIT Kanpur  MoneycontrolView Full coverage on Google News
description: Beyond the government funding, the IITs, especially the older ones, are increasingly looking at industry support, donations from past students and endowments to accelerate their growth and achieve desired expansion.
